r.d: Provides an API to talk to the timsieved server that comes with Cyrus IMAPd. Can be used to install, remove, mark active etc sieve scripts.
r.n: * Fixed Bug #8452 Unterminated read loop * Fixed Bug #7845 Add mbstring support * Added Request #8071 Enable the ability to toggle TLS support if available. * Added Request #8453 Clean up PHPDoc and comments
